event.title: is bounded by the following parishes: Humbie to the east, Soutra (to which it is now

data.event: It is bounded by the following parishes: Humbie to the east, Soutra (to which it is now conjoined) on the south, Heriot & Stow on the west, and on the north by the detached parts of Borthwick, Cranstoun, and Crichton.

event.title: today the A68), with a still extant Toll House at Fala, was constructed

data.event: In 1834 a road (today the A68), with a still extant Toll House at Fala, was constructed between Edinburgh and Lauder and it bisects the parish, marking off the cultivated lands to the east from the pastures to the west.
